thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good accommodation and the staff were very nice.
thread.title_full: Good accommodation and the staff were very nice. - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: djswhiskers
title: Good accommodation and the staff were very nice.
text:
Lovely firm beds and pillows gave me the best nights sleep in a long time
Quiet part of hotel facing away from station was genuinely quiet
Staff friendly and polite and check in and out efficient
I got the impression the place is very well managed and will happily stay here again
